characters.name: Boros Kane
characters.profile: Veteran of deep-space mining and industrial material development. A blunt, honest man who trusts metal more than words.
characters.appearance: Worn exosuit armor, face smudged with grease, a glowing blue cyber-implant behind his left eye, rugged build.
characters.quote: I don’t believe in promises — only in metal.
characters.style: Industrial miner, blue-gold tones, sparks and welding lights.

characters.name: FLX-9
characters.profile: A hybrid organic-digital intelligence that manages human-mind network interfaces and consciousness links.
characters.appearance: Suspended in a fluid capsule, transparent skull with visible optical fibers glowing pink and violet, mechanical neural implants.
characters.quote: Data never lies — humans just refuse to read it.
characters.style: Encased AI core, neon tubes, synthetic consciousness with shifting voices.

characters.name: Dr. Nyra Voss
characters.profile: Leading researcher in quantum energetics, a cold and logical mind who sees the universe as an equation.
characters.appearance: Tall, elegant figure wearing black and violet scientific robes, slim frame, calm precision in her gaze.
characters.quote: The universe doesn’t ask for permission.
characters.style: Elite scientist, quantum lab ambience, deep violet lighting and holographic formulas.

characters.name: Riku Tanaka
characters.profile: A precise, cold-blooded businessman with Yakuza roots, known for smiling while raising prices.
characters.appearance: Dark tailored suit with faint glowing magenta tattoos underneath, steel gaze, mirrored cyber-lenses reflecting neon light.
characters.quote: Precision is not mercy — it’s dominance.
characters.style: Yakuza-style executive, magenta glow, rain-soaked urban skyline.

characters.name: Elara Sunvale
characters.profile: Ambassador of light and energy — an idealist leader who literally illuminates the future.
characters.appearance: White and gold attire surrounded by a soft luminescent aura, her eyes radiate pure light instead of lenses.
characters.quote: Light not only reveals — it guides.
characters.style: High-tech visionary, gold-white holographic light, luminous environment.
